descriptionEN: A calculator made with pure JS, evaluating the calculation with algorithims of my own design using recursion.
Ray casting tests made with pure JS, accompanied with polygon generation & modification options and stylization options.
A circle collision sim test, motor built after https://www.vobarian.com/collisions/2dcollisions2.pdf ...
A minecraft plugin made with Java, aiming to give restricted spectator mode to server users.
A locally played chess game made with java.
A website created with React and Bootstrap as a learning experience and a way to showcase skills.
REST API done with php and communicated with via JS.
